summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of new Ignite Dashboard implementation. All 12 specified test cases passed: Quiz flow (8 questions), Results view with score/pillars/allocation, Teaser Dashboard, Stage 2 Questionnaire (5 steps), Ignite Dashboard (5 tabs), Salary Increment Simulator, and Lead Capture Modal.

integration_issues.issue: Supabase 'detailed_leads' table may not exist - submission will fail gracefully. Same for workshop form ('leads' table).

issues: @import must precede all other statements in index.css - CSS import order should be fixed

action_items: Create Supabase 'detailed_leads' table for lead capture from Ignite Dashboard
Create Supabase 'leads' table for workshop form on results page
Fix duplicate '@supabase/supabase-js' entry in package.json (lines 16 and 45)
Fix CSS @import order in index.css (imports should come before other statements)
critical_code_review_comments: Duplicate dependency in package.json: @supabase/supabase-js appears twice (line 16 and 45)
Stage2Questionnaire step 5 validation: isStepValid requires riskProfile !== 'Moderate' which means default cannot be Moderate - potential UX confusion as Moderate is pre-selected
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes - good testability
Dark theme implementation using 'ignite-theme' CSS class works correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: Full Ignite Dashboard flow tested successfully: Home (/) -> Quiz (8 questions) -> Results (score 85/100) -> Teaser Dashboard (/teaser with dark theme, score 48/100) -> Stage 2 Questionnaire (/stage2 with 5 steps: Income, Assets, Liabilities, Protection, Goals) -> Ignite Dashboard (/ignite with 5 tabs: Overview, Retirement, Portfolio, Protection, Goals). All tabs clickable and functional. Salary Increment Simulator with slider (3%-20%) works correctly. Lead capture modal opens via 'Talk to Expert' button with name/email/phone fields. Supabase tables need to be created for lead persistence.
test_flows_verified: Home page loads at / with 'Start Free Assessment' button
Quiz completes through all 8 questions with progress bar
Results view shows: score circle (85/100), pillar breakdown, allocation pie chart, emergency fund card, action items
Teaser Dashboard shows: estimated score (48/100), net worth, savings rate, retirement ready, primary goal metrics
'Unlock Full Ignite Report' CTA navigates to /stage2
Stage 2 Step 1 (Income): monthly income input, secondary income toggle, job stability buttons, dependents
Stage 2 Step 2 (Assets): equity/MF, fixed income, EPF/PPF/NPS, gold, real estate, cash, RSU toggle
Stage 2 Step 3 (Liabilities): home/car/personal loan outstanding and EMIs, credit card debt
Stage 2 Step 4 (Protection): term life cover, health cover, emergency fund months toggle
Stage 2 Step 5 (Goals): retirement age toggle, risk profile buttons, top 3 goals selection
Ignite Dashboard Overview tab: Wealth Score (55/100), net worth, liquid net worth, monthly surplus, savings rate, wealth mirror, peer benchmarks
Ignite Dashboard Retirement tab: readiness meter, current/target age, years left, salary increment simulator with interactive slider, what-if scenarios, corpus comparison
Ignite Dashboard Portfolio tab: asset terrain map, real estate warning, equity alignment, debt vs invest analysis, EMI load analysis
Ignite Dashboard Protection tab: life cover analyzer, health cover analyzer, emergency fund gauge, liquid net worth, protection checklist
Ignite Dashboard Goals tab: financial goals list, quick wins, FIRE calculator, wealth milestones, blurred advisor insights CTA
Lead capture modal opens on 'Talk to Expert' click with name/email/phone fields
